SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class StarterCardTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.StarterCardTest
public class StarterCardTest extends Object
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of StarterCard. This test class loads starter cards from a JSON file and tests different methods of StarterCard.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws JsonLoadException
      Sets up the initial state for each test case by loading starter cards from a JSON file.
      Throws:
      JsonLoadException - if there's an issue loading JSON data.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up the resources after each test case by resetting starterCardList to null.

    • getKingdomTest

      public void getKingdomTest()
      Tests the StarterCard.getKingdom() method of StarterCard. Verifies that the kingdom symbol is Symbol.EMPTY for each starter card.

    • getCornerTest

      public void getCornerTest()
      Tests the StarterCard.getCorner(CornerPosition, boolean) method of StarterCard. Verifies that corners are retrieved correctly for each starter card.

    • getSymbolsOnSideTest

      public void getSymbolsOnSideTest()
      Tests the StarterCard.getSymbolsOnSide(boolean) method of StarterCard. Verifies that symbols on the side are retrieved correctly for each starter card.

    • getCenterSymbolsTest

      public void getCenterSymbolsTest()
      Tests the StarterCard.getCenterSymbols(boolean) method of StarterCard. Verifies that center symbols are retrieved correctly for each starter card.

    • constructorException

      public void constructorException()
